website_summaries.verdict: A quality bag from a trusted brand. Lots of extra storage and straps.
pros: Quality ventilation and drainage so you can pop in your boots as soon as you get off the mountain
Spacious enough to fit your boots and all your other gear
cons: Not padded at all so not great for using as checked luggage

customer_reviews.title: This bag is not padded at all
customer_reviews.text: I have an older High Sierra boot bag that looks very similar to this one, so I ordered this one as a replacement. They might look the same, but this one is definitely much poorer quality. The old bag had padding on the back and a separate mesh compartment for the helmet. This bag has no padding whatsoever and no helmet compartment. I haven't tried using it yet, but my first impression is not very favorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Middle area fits pants, jacket, helmet plus room for more. Love the design too.
customer_reviews.author: Csquared

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these bags for my kids. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these bags for my kids. I never would've purchased them if I had seen them in person. Cheap flimsy material, made in china, cheap zippers, no padding. I paid around $40 on Amazon. You can find Swix, Dakine and Athalon bags for maybe $20 more. Those brands have proper pockets, webbed handles, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JDavis

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was getting a great deal on a bag similar to my wifes
customer_reviews.text: Very skimpy, thin material, especially handle. One of the reviews compared this to a $100 bag, that is a joke. From the online picture, I thought I was getting a great deal on a bag similar to my wifes. This bag is not padded at all, has no structure by itself. It works OK once you put your gear in it, so I am not going to go through the hassle of returning it. Next time I would only buy a bag in a store, where looks aren't so deceiving. The Black Bag is this bag. The Blue Bag is my wifes.
customer_reviews.author: Ron750

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my wife. I laugh when I see her wearing it as she looks like a kid with an oversized backpack. She absolutely loves it. The zippers are the bigger ones that should last. The material is a normal canvas. I believe it will hold up over time. It definitely fits a pair of boots plus has room for a helmet or other clothing or food in the middle compartment. Overall, it was a great value and my wife is happy. Double win!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Troy

customer_reviews.title: The product I received was nothing like what's shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was nothing like what's shown in the picture! It almost looked like a cheap knock-off. Floppy material with cheap zippers. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Shirin

customer_reviews.title: The color also stands out amongst other bags which is also helpful and I love that is it a backpack style
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits a lot of stuff and I have used it a few times while going on flights for ski trips. It has withstood being thrown around by bag handlers and having big bulky items in it such as my ski helmet and ski boots. The color also stands out amongst other bags which is also helpful and I love that is it a backpack style, it makes carry with my ski bag and other suitcase a lot easier. I would purchase this product again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, large and durable.  Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits a pair of men's ski boots (size 27), helmet, gloves, extra socks, hat and goggles with room to spare for snacks, tissues, etc. I would give it 5 stars, but it's tricky getting the second shoulder strap on-especially when wearing a ski jacket. Overall, I love this bag for the convenience of having hands free to carry the skis and poles. And the size is perfect. It's lightweight but seems durable. It doesn't add much weight at all to your gear. We've used it for one season and it's held up well. It may be the best ski boot backpack available. So far, I haven't found a better one. And the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: resusiana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious, and seems pretty sturdy. It holds a pair of boots and all the small items for a day of skiing. I can even fit a pair of ski boot and another pair of snowboard boots for travel and summer storage. The only thing I would like is some padding in the outer walls.
customer_reviews.author: Handy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought, in a good way!
customer_reviews.text: For those looking for a large boot bag, this may be it. I bought this for my kids to share. We fit: both pair of boots (mondo 18&20), both helmets, both harnesses, a boot dryer, a large bag of hand warmers, and 4 pair of goggles. There is still more room! Seems very well made and it has backpack straps. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Twins Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I used this for a season and it stood up very well and was spacious enough for my helmet, boots, gloves, several pairs of socks and pants. So far it has been very durable and I don't foresee it breaking down anytime soon. I think that as long as you let it air dry after a week(end) of skiing, it will hold up for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: D J Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It is very convenient and works well although it is relatively no frills. I wish that it had smaller inside pockets for smaller items, but instead it just has one large inside pocket which holds my helmet and goggles. Overall, I am happy with the bag and would recommend it to others. However, if you are look for the most feature packed bag then you might want to consider other options.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for the money - holds lots of gear.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for the price. Only had a small hole after first flight. Holds a pair of boots, helmet, ski pants, gloves, etc. so it makes it much easier to transport your gear. I just wish that it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very functional. This thing is bigger than i thought, based on the photo. I have size 13 snowboard boots. They fit. I can also fit my helmet, goggles, a couple pairs of gloves and maybe an extra shirt. I also got these for my kids (10 and 12) and their ski-gear (boots, helmets, etc.) easily fit and the bags are very easy for them to carry. The material and zippers seem OK... not great but not too cheap-o either. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scrubbrush

customer_reviews.title: Cool bag...
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far.... surprisingly large center compartment, fits helmet bag, goggles, gloves, two extra insulation jackets with good packing. Would've given 5 stars, but the lack of structure in the bag makes it a little hard to work with sometimes and without full contents the bag collapses in ways that make it look odd if you're wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Foster

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and look AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Look SO awesome! I love this boot bag! I’d say the quality is even a bit better than expected for the price! Easy to carry, tighten, and loosen. Tons of storage space, and water drain holes at the bottom of the boot storage pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: The picture is a bit misleading in that this bag is flimsy while empty. The picture makes the bag appear sturdier than it is. I also would have liked a few secondary pockets, maybe on the front or back. However, the bag has plenty of room for 2 boots, separated, a helmet, and a few articles of clothing on top of the helmet. Good bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: hvymtlrlz87

customer_reviews.title: Large Ski Boot Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is well made, solid and attractive. It is large enough to hold other ski clothing- hats, socks etc. Glad I bought it but would like something a little smaller and more fitted to the ski boots to hold them securely.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for what I needed it for. It's nice and simple and holds ALL of my ski gear. 28.5 boots, XL helmet, goggles, face and neck covers, gloves, socks, ski pants, fleece pullover and there is still room. Free up some space in main compartment by putting gloves, socks, etc in with your boots....there's still plenty of room for them. The bag is not padded except for the shoulder straps, so just pad your back with your folded up clothing if need be. I'm extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: A.Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This bag easily fit mine and my husbands ski boots, which made travel easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin B

customer_reviews.title: Great pattern and HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this boot bag...colorful and roomy. It’s really large and she fits everything needed for a day on the slopes - and extras!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack Boot Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great ski boot bag. Easily able to fit ski boots, helmet, gloves and more into the bag. Backpack feature worked great, but would probably not check the bag as the structure might not protect your gear from harsh bag handling. Fits into overhead well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the cheapest and i wasn't sure if i would like using a boot bag
customer_reviews.text: bought it because it was the cheapest and i wasn't sure if i would like using a boot bag. It didn't disappoint. Its very basic though and after one season I upgraded to the Kulkea bag, which has better build quality and more than one pocket.
customer_reviews.author: AlexCT

customer_reviews.title: It hold my stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for three seasons and it's still going strong. It holds not only my boots helmet and goggles but tree pairs of gloves, an extra knit hat, an layer for really cold days (which I really needed Jan-March 2014), two small cameras, a water bottle, a bottle of gaterade, a small themos and a lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Misuraca

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but very roomy for my 12 yrs old ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but very roomy for my 12 yrs old son’s ski boots, helmet, mittens and all others things needed for the slope.
customer_reviews.author: Lexgal

customer_reviews.title: The picture is a bit deceiving. There appears to ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture is a bit deceiving. There appears to be padding in the picture. There isn't. The boots will bang around and bruise you a bit, but it holds together.
customer_reviews.author: A. Case

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: It holds so much stuff! During the off-season I use it as a weekend bag and I can get more in it than in my carry-on sized suitcase. It doesn't FEEL especially sturdy when you get it, but it got me through the ski season without any signs of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I wanted in a ski bag. I purchased in February for a family ski vacation. My boots fit well (size 6 1/2 Womens) in the side pockets and plenty of room for my helmet, snacks and extra hat, gloves in the center compartment. Backpack style was convenient for carrying skis and wrangling children. The pattern was as shown.
customer_reviews.author: KMcBride

customer_reviews.title: Great Ski Gear Bag
customer_reviews.text: Very good bag, good solid build. Big enough to hold all my gear, and I love the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: GummiMedved

customer_reviews.title: Easily holds boots
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy. Easily holds boots, helmet and other items like goggles, gloves. etc. Backpack feature is nice for carrying through airport. Once bag is empty, it "collapses" enough that it could be used on the slopes if necessary. The material is not "super heavy duty", but rugged enough, and zippers are good quality. It also matches my High Sierra ski bag that I bought last year (but seems to no longer be available for purchase.)
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Very happy. Other members of the family liked it do much that they're ordering their own.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable and big enough for my boots and helmet, though snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have big boots, they fit perfectly and there enough space to fit everything I need for a day trip, minus ski pants. Quality seems good, shoulder straps are adjustable and did the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: EagleWolf1

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity -- back padding would be nice.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is more lightweight than I expected (seems less durable than an older boot bag I have) and there is no padding in the back like you would have with most backpacks. On a positive note, it holds a ton although I don't think I would fill it to capacity since I am not sure how much the straps can handle. I can easily fit: boots, gloves, helmet, goggles, as many extra layers as I could wear. I think if I put my ski pants in my ski bag I could easily go away on an overnight ski trip with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: susan e

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Works great and plenty of room for your ski equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot
customer_reviews.text: I fit my ski boots, jacket, pants, hat mittens, socks and 2 pairs of leggings and 3 base layers. Perfect! I'm a size small and 5'5.
customer_reviews.author: E.H.

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good. If you are carrying it for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: This boot bag has enough room for boots, helmet and gear, It is light weight and reasonable priced. The quality is good. If you are carrying it for a while it is uncomfortable and lacks padding. Good for short carries from parking to the lodge or lift.
customer_reviews.author: Alferd Weinhofer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, thin material. Boyfriend received another brand for ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, thin material. Boyfriend received another brand for Christmas and it was a million times nicer. Returned this one for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Venomiss008

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pack to carry your boots
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pack to carry your boots, helmet, gloves and extra layers. Durable and ergonomic. only gripe is that if you overstuff the middle it can be hard to get the boots in the sides.
customer_reviews.author: finny7

customer_reviews.title: Bag has worked great. Nice way for my daughter to carry her ...
customer_reviews.text: Bag has worked great. Nice way for my daughter to carry her stuff for ski school on her back vs. a duffel.
customer_reviews.author: S.L

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, my husband was very happy with the durable quality and the overall look of the bag. Also a great bag for rollerblades.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: This is the shizzy
customer_reviews.text: Fit two pair of boots, helmets and gloves in it. Couldn't be happier. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: The Bugman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Having a backpack style boot bag makes the trek from the car to the lodge so much better! Each side has a pocket for a boot and this evenly distributes the weight. The middle pocket has room for my gloves, helmet, goggles, snacks, and extra layers.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great, roomy and really have held up. Can fit a ton of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: TJB

customer_reviews.title: Very large and can fit both boots plus a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Very large and can fit both boots plus a lot more but the quality of the bag was a bit disappointing. Very thin material and nothing has been an issue yet but I can't imagine a few baggage checks without some issues. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: K. DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack, Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, arrived on time, packaged well. The pockets fit everything I need for skiing and the straps are comfortable. Recommend for sure! Also love the color 😍
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Boots and more!
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag as a gift from my kids and they made a great choice. Good quality and lots of room without being too big.
customer_reviews.author: S. Garnier

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. boots fit nicely on the outside with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. boots fit nicely on the outside with plenty of storage in the middle. I stored size 12 (us) ski boots easily and added a pair of jeans, ski sweater, socks, hats, and a helmet in the middle. the back pack straps make handling the pac easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mogues

customer_reviews.title: Hands Free Skiing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother for his birthday. He loves it. Holds everything he needs and keeps his hands free to carry other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ashfault

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with plenty of storage
customer_reviews.text: Definitely has the storage space needed for helmet, boots, gloves, pants, etc. Seems sturdy so far. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubee

customer_reviews.title: Surprising large. Can fit my boots in side pockets ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprising large. Can fit my boots in side pockets and helmet in center along with outerwear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like these
customer_reviews.text: these are very large in size and hold quite a bit... we ordered 3 of these for my 2 boys and my husband. they seem to be holding up fairly well for what these 3 put them thru...
customer_reviews.author: Heather Misiaszek

customer_reviews.title: Buy the better bag
customer_reviews.text: Decent size but fabric is a bit thinner than I expected. I have other High Sierra bags and while they were a bit more expensive, the difference in quality of materials is shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy for packing helmet, googles, and other things.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Maginnis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for holding my boots, helmets, gloves and snacks for the day. Plenty of room, the only thing it is a cheaper version, and there is no heater. My next bag will have the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk S

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This bag hold a lot, boots, helmet, gloves, and more. The straps for the backpack are padded,sturdy, adjustable. The pack is comfortable and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price but no pockets
customer_reviews.text: Go this for one of my kids that does not ski a lot. Typical good construction as I have found from all High Sierra product. The only down-dies of this model is there are no storage pockets other than the zip compartments for the boots. We also have Transpaks and they zip compartments do come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: MJK

customer_reviews.title: Great boot bag
customer_reviews.text: Great boot bag. Plenty of room for everything I need, plus has room for my and my daughters helmets.
customer_reviews.author: nryan123

customer_reviews.title: Boot Bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and for the price, unbeatable. I am very happy and would recommend. Fits my ski boots and plenty of other warm gear in the center pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Music Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: high sieerra trapezoid boot bag bought this for my husband
customer_reviews.text: he just loved it, he can carry everything in one bag now and its is so much easier for skiing, he is 75.
customer_reviews.author: bernice turetsky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My ski boots fit and helmet. Quality seems okay. I will try it out next winter.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sienkiewich

customer_reviews.title: Fun design and tons of space
customer_reviews.text: A wonderfully sized bag that fits my ski boots, helmet, and even googles, gloves, snow pants and still has room!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent & Functional ski bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag in the last 3 skiing seasons and it served me very well. I recommend it as a better value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a ski bag. Decent size and quality. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Darek

customer_reviews.title: Carry on for the plane
customer_reviews.text: So, I traveled with this bag recently and was very pleased that it fit quite well in the airplane overhead cabin. I do suffer from back and shoulder pain from time to time and generally do not like to use a backpack. This bag however, was very comfortable and did not feel heavy with all of my ski gear.
customer_reviews.author: pillar2205

customer_reviews.title: Great ski boot bag
customer_reviews.text: Well built, fits my ski boots in the outer pockets so that my helmet, goggles and gloves stay dry and clean in the center. I've been skiing for 37 years, at least 20 days per year, and I put all of my gear through its paces. I have read other reviews that say the quality is so-so, but that has not been my experience.
customer_reviews.author: togoDog

customer_reviews.title: great boot bag
customer_reviews.text: great boot bag, super handy to have backpack straps instead of having to lug yet another bag at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, if it wasn’t damaged!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVED the bag but it was damaged and dirty! Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. Which is what I wanted, but for some reason it appears to be bigger than in the photo. I think the picture is elongated vertically. In reality, it is more square, if not even wider than tall. Backpack straps are nice. There are drain holes in the bottom of the side boot compartments. Holds: my boots, my helmet, my daughter's helmet, all of our gear (googles, gloves, neck gaiters, even pants) except jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space and the drains are nice
customer_reviews.text: There is always enough space to fit all of my misc gear, and the drains at the bottom of the boot pockets ensure that the melting snow doesn't ruin the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hogate

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the price! Keeps all my kid's skiing sh** in one place and neatly stowed (except for skis and poles).
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very handy bag. Allows to carry some extra items along with ski boots.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and easy to put in boots and helmet but not build ...
customer_reviews.text: Light duty bag. Roomy and easy to put in boots and helmet but not build to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Osmecki

customer_reviews.title: boot bag
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son and he was very pleased when he opened it. The quality was very good.
customer_reviews.author: toby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my size 13 boots very well and nicely designed!
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: Certainly makes it a better value.
customer_reviews.text: Saw item while skiing in Breckenridge. When I got it realized I can use it for trips other than skiing. Certainly makes it a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious, does the job
customer_reviews.text: I had a concern - I have size 13 boots, but they fit right in. Great design in my opinion: Boots go into two side compartments, good if they are wet and dirty. The main compartment is very spacious - enough for helmet, mask, gloves, etc. with room to spare. The only tick against this bag is that the zippers are not industrial strength. So you have to be somewhat gentle. At the same time they are not about to fall apart either.
customer_reviews.author: VbTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Great for snowboarders!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! My 11 year old daughter uses it for Ski Club. It fits her snowboarding boots, pants, helmet, googles, gloves, extra socks and her dinner! All that and she can manage the bag easily as a backpack. Also it was affordable! Win,win!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great value. If you organize and pack well
customer_reviews.text: Great value. If you organize and pack well, it can fit boots, helmet, goggles, and 2-3 days worth of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: John Kwening

customer_reviews.title: average
customer_reviews.text: It's not as large as you'd think and the quality is ok. I've had several boot bags and wouldn't recommend this unless you ski once or twice a year.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: The perfect ski bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag!! Lots of space and easy to carry. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M Emerson

customer_reviews.title: but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Material is thinner than some other boot bags, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable to carry as carryon
customer_reviews.text: spacious but has no padding whatsoever. not comfortable to carry as carryon.
customer_reviews.author: toto

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my gear easily. Lots of extra space in the center section ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my gear easily. Lots of extra space in the center section for a helmet, gloves, lunch, etc. Backpack straps are easy to slip on and snug up.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Donaghey

customer_reviews.title: think the bag is a "second"
customer_reviews.text: The zipper was a little messed up but the bag works pretty well. I think it's a "second" because the zipper sticks and get caught. Very cheap compared to ski boot bags in stores
customer_reviews.author: Liana Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag for my 13 year old!!! So much room to fit everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but sturdy enough for all of our gear. We could fit a pair of adult boots in the side pockets, a pair of kid boots in the middle, main compartment along with two helmets and some gloves, hats, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AEW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bag did not fit our boots and helmet. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Neary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awsome bag, fits my boots, helmet, gloves, hat, pants and then some....
customer_reviews.author: Edward Santaniello

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. My only concern is I hope the zippers hold up. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Lakeman

customer_reviews.title: Quality has slipped for this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I was actually disappointed with this boot bag. My husband purchased the High Sierra Trapezoid Boot Bag a few years ago, has used it extensively and is very pleased with his. The older version is a much better quality product. My biggest disappointment is that the handle is flimsy. The previous bag has a larger, sturdier one. If I had seen this product in the store, I would not have selected it. I was eager to have a new ski boot bag that would allow me to carry it as a backpack; I will be able to do that, but won't feel comfortable carrying it by the handle.
customer_reviews.author: NCJ

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color received!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my niece and my daughter and the option I chose online was a very cute black bag with turquoise designs on it. What I received were plain black boot bags (very nice quality) - however, they are NOT what was represented online! I contacted Campmoor to resolve the issue and they informed me that black is all that they have. They tell me it was a coding error with Amazon. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hearsey

customer_reviews.title: Just what he wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my dear husband. He's happy so I'm happy! And the price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good for storage
customer_reviews.text: Not padded but it's very roomy and holds literally all my ski gear. Probably wouldn't use it for air travel but for general storage it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: nice for putting your gear in and throwing over your ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd bag I have bought, nice for putting your gear in and throwing over your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Urban

customer_reviews.title: Very good boot bag
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from a week of snowboarding in Taos, Wolf Creek and Durango. This bag handled the flights and daily trips to the hill very well. Plenty of room for size 11 boots, helmet, gloves, etc. For flight, I packed bibs, fleece coat, gloves, etc. into it as well. I would denfinitely purchase this bag again!
customer_reviews.author: BoarderDude

customer_reviews.title: Ripped on first trip
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my trip out to Colorado. Great design but the bag handle on the top ripped out from the luggage handler. It was gate checked on a regional turbo prop flight. The gate check tag was on this and they lost it. Since the bag then had no tag, they were refusing to give me my bag when I got off the flight. Luckily the pilot intervened and I got my bag. Good design, crappy quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Syslo

product_meta.title: High Sierra Ski/Snowboard Boot Bag Backpack
feature_bullets: Made from Diamond ripstop Duralite, 600 Denier Duralite.
Large main compartment with U-shaped opening holds your gear and keeps it safe.
Two zippered side compartments with drainage/ventilation grommets hold ski or snowboarding boots up to size 13.
Adjustable padded backpack straps for easy carrying.
Convenient webbing grab handle for an added carry option.
